data.name: Movavi Slideshow Maker 8 Effects - Let's Start a Vlog Set
data.detailed_description:
Say “hi” to this engaging effects set, created to enhance any kind of vlog. Interact with your audience with these appealing effects!

This set includes:

  • My Channel Pack
  • Elegant Vlog Pack
  • Click the Bell Pack
  • Soft Minimalism Pack

In this set, you’ll find:

  • 64 titles
  • 23 stickers
  • 12 backgrounds
  • 18 transitions
  • 8 intros
  • 1 frame
  • 10 outro videos

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Slideshow Maker 8.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10/11 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Х® 10.13.6 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel® processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
